entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
